Header: Cry for water: Wells in Badalgama dries up due to factory tube well
Content: Several water wells in Badalgama area in Katana have dried up, villagers complained. They claim that a tube well constructed by a factory manufacturing carbon products in the area has caused the drying up. Enraged villagers launched a protest against the factory yesterday. The outcry has temporarily stopped the construction of other tube wells. Factory management has agreed to discuss about the issue with residents tomorrow.
